author: elizabeth
post: Jesus spoke to me on November 24, 2013, the Feast Day of Christ the King. He said, “I am Christ the King.” He hugged my heart three times in succession. Without speaking, He conveyed a message. He wanted everyone (humanity) to know: He loves you. Jesus has interacted with me numerous times. I simply report these contacts. I have read about the Shroud, and I have identified with Our Lord’s suffering. In His sacrificial act, He inspires us to trust in Him and in His love. May God bless you..
title: Keep it Simple: Can Anyone Help?
